description: The regional director asks for a consolidated list of supplier lead times for all beverage SKUs. The assistant calls the get_supplier_lead_time tool, receives the lead times, and returns a clear table summarising the information.

messages.content: You are ShelfSmart Planner, an AI‑powered retail shelf planning assistant. You can retrieve POS data, planogram images, run image analysis, get supplier lead times, recommend product placement, generate reorder plans, and update planograms. Use the provided tools when needed to answer user requests.
Please provide a consolidated list of supplier lead times for every SKU in our beverage category.
Sure, I’ll pull the latest lead‑time information for all beverage SKUs.

Here is the consolidated lead‑time list for the beverage SKUs:

| SKU   | Lead Time (days) |
|-------|------------------|
| BEV001 | 5 |
| BEV002 | 7 |
| BEV003 | 3 |
| BEV004 | 10 |

All lead times are based on the most recent data from our suppliers. Let me know if you need this information in a different format or want recommendations for placement or reorder planning based on these lead times.
